name: SASF Custom Fields
description: 35 custom fields for Full Self Assessment Survey form

fields.name: q01_vision_mission_clear
fields.label: There are clear and succinct Vision, Mission (Mandate) statements that accurately describe what your organization does and strives for.

fields.name: q02_unique_services
fields.label: There is no other organization, in your community, that offers the same services.

fields.name: q03_strategic_goals
fields.label: There is a set of up to 6 strategic goals (Strategic Plan) updated no more than four years ago

fields.name: q04_annual_operational_plan
fields.label: Staff develop an annual operational plan, based on/reflecting the strategic goals (Strategic Plan) of the organization. The plan includes clear measurable goals and tracks activities/outputs and if possible, impacts which are reported on at least semi-annually.

fields.name: q05_governance_documents
fields.label: Board governance documents and policies are up to date and reviewed on a regular basis. This includes by-laws, Articles (Letters Patent), Committee structures/roles/terms of reference, meeting Minutes (record of decisions), conflict of interest.

fields.name: q06_board_composition
fields.label: The Board of Directors has the appropriate size, composition (including diverse representation) and skill sets to support the organization.

fields.name: q07_board_committees
fields.label: The Board makes use of committees where they are helpful and does so effectively.

fields.name: q08_board_effectiveness
fields.label: The Board works effectively, makes timely decisions, and positively supports the organization.

fields.name: q09_board_self_assessment
fields.label: The Board periodically carries out a self-assessment (at least every 3 years)

fields.name: q10_budget_financial_statements
fields.label: There is an annual budget (balanced) and at least quarterly financial statements based on it, and these are reviewed and 'accepted' by the Board of Directors or Board Committee.

fields.name: q11_risk_management
fields.label: There is a risk management (financial, reputational, operational) analysis and plan in place updated every two to three years.

fields.name: q12_contingency_fund
fields.label: The organization has at least a three-month operating costs contingency fund set aside.

fields.name: q13_audit_review
fields.label: An annual audit or review engagement is carried out with Board oversight.

fields.name: q14_funding_contracts
fields.label: All funding contracts, donor receipting, and relational follow up with funders, are in good order and the Board is kept updated on these.

fields.name: q15_donations_policy
fields.label: The Board has established a donations policy and/or there is a donor management strategy in place.

fields.name: q16_financial_reporting
fields.label: Financial reporting to CRA (Canada Revenue Agency) and other funders is done on-time, accurately, and is reviewed and approved by the Board/Finance Committee.

fields.name: q17_financial_viability
fields.label: The Board, senior staff, and where applicable Members are comfortable with the financial viability of the organization.

fields.name: q18_executive_director_confidence
fields.label: The Executive Director/most senior staff person has the full confidence of the Board of Directors, and they work well together.

fields.name: q19_executive_limitations
fields.label: The Board has set "executive limitations" and/or supports the operational autonomy of the executive staff.

fields.name: q20_sufficient_qualified_staff
fields.label: There are a sufficient number of appropriately qualified employees (and volunteers) to achieve the mission of the organization.

fields.name: q21_diverse_employee_cohort
fields.label: The employee cohort is diverse and representative of the wider community.

fields.name: q22_job_descriptions_evaluations
fields.label: All employees have a job description (regularly reviewed and updated), an annualized work plan, and an annual evaluation, kept on file.

fields.name: q23_hr_policy_manual
fields.label: There is a current Human Resources Policy/Manual outlining (at a minimum) hiring protocols, terms of employment that comply with any relevant legislation, as well as complaint, conflict of interest, DEI policy, and abuse/harassment policies.

fields.name: q24_compensation_review
fields.label: Employee compensation is reviewed on a regular basis and is in line with that of other similar organizations (including Executive Director).

fields.name: q25_volunteer_involvement
fields.label: Volunteers are involved at the operational and governance levels of the organization.

fields.name: q26_volunteer_job_descriptions
fields.label: Every volunteer has a job description, an outline of their time commitment and any provided benefits, an identified supervisor, and they receive appropriate orientation and training aligned with their role. NOTE this may be as brief as a single paragraph.

fields.name: q27_volunteer_screening
fields.label: The organization has a screening policy and appropriately screens any volunteer with access to money or vulnerable people, including the requirement of a Police Records Check. NOTE – PRC is not required for every volunteer position, only those considered high risk.

fields.name: q28_diverse_volunteer_cohort
fields.label: The volunteer cohort is diverse and representative of the wider community.

fields.name: q29_client_group_volunteers
fields.label: Individuals representing the client group served by the organization have the opportunity to contribute and/or be a volunteer.

fields.name: q30_volunteer_positions_effective
fields.label: Volunteer positions are designed and allocated in the organization effectively and volunteers contribute to achieving the goals of the organization.

fields.name: q31_fundraising_strategy
fields.label: The organization has an effective fundraising strategy, aligned with the annual Budget and related to the Mission.

fields.name: q32_compelling_communications
fields.label: The organization engages in compelling communications (marketing) with clients, donors, funders and/or the public, which aligns with the Vision and Mission.

fields.name: q33_communication_guidelines
fields.label: There are guidelines on who may speak for the organization as well as for use of social media to share information.

fields.name: q34_website_technology
fields.label: There is a good website, and the organization utilizes technology effectively within the context of the Mission and resources available.

fields.name: q35_positive_reputation
fields.label: The organization has a good and positive reputation and is known for doing great work.
